channel.title: Wtf.. Server working for 2 wks.. then can't log in?
channel.description:
OK! Hi, i am c4td0g, A.K.A [glow=yellow,2,300]Volt Hero[/glow], on my server, RockMyScape... Anyway to the actual problem:
[b][u]Problem:[/u][/b] Can't log in, neither can one of my friends.
[b][u]Server Base:[/u][/b] PimpScape
So.. My server HAS been WORKING properly, swell and all good, etc. However.. i encountered a problem about 2/3 days ago.. a VERY strange problem... Whenever i try to log in with ANY username and/or password, even with my main account/hoster: Volt Hero, MoparScape freezes... in other words, it just freezes or stays when says "Logging in - please wait."... Then
BAM!
When i looked in compile.BAT it said... client test (i was using that username) DISCONNECTED - WHY?
Another StRaNgE error: After noticing that error i tried many dif usernames... NONE worked... anyway the other error is: I never use runserver.BAT to run my server (i ALWAYS used compile.BAT - and it WORKED for the past 2 wks.. like it says in the title...)
Well, after that error, i tried using runserver.BAT to well.. run my server.. and guess what happened?!? Runserver.BAT closes EXTREMELY quickly without saying anything - WEIRD..
[b][u]Details About My Server:[/u][/b] It's a HAMACHI server... i have hamachi logged in whenever possible, in this case RiGhT now (in the date of this thread).
SO! Ppl, if u care to help, PLEASE do. I really want my server up and running again.. This is the most strangest error i have ever encountered...
:)

item.title: Wtf.. Server working for 2 wks.. then can't log in?
item.dc:creator: @HeroFTW HeroFTW
item.description:
@HeroFTW wrote:

Your Gonna have to delete everything in the SavedGames Folder. Same thing happened to me. Everyone has to restart their characters. Or it may be because you added someone on your friends list :o

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf.. Server working for 2 wks.. then can't log in?

item.title: Wtf.. Server working for 2 wks.. then can't log in?
item.dc:creator: @c4td0g_pwnz_j00 c4td0g pwnz j00
item.description:
@c4td0g_pwnz_j00 wrote:

Nuh, doesn’t work mate… Like i said, in compiler is says the player is DISCONNECTED after a few seconds for no apparent reason… and plus read the runserver.bat part… perhaps you can help me on that one?

[br][size=1]Posted at: December 17, 2006, 07:56:23 PM[/size][hr]Endar… Hmm never heard of it? Anyway, i’ll check it…

Read full topic

item.description:
@c4td0g_pwnz_j00 wrote:

OK! Hi, i am c4td0g, A.K.A [glow=yellow,2,300]Volt Hero[/glow], on my server, RockMyScape… Anyway to the actual problem:

Problem: Can’t log in, neither can one of my friends.

Server Base: PimpScape

So… My server HAS been WORKING properly, swell and all good, etc. However… i encountered a problem about 2/3 days ago… a VERY strange problem… Whenever i try to log in with ANY username and/or password, even with my main account/hoster: Volt Hero, MoparScape freezes… in other words, it just freezes or stays when says “Logging in - please wait.”… Then

BAM!

When i looked in compile.BAT it said… client test (i was using that username) DISCONNECTED - WHY?

Another StRaNgE error: After noticing that error i tried many dif usernames… NONE worked… anyway the other error is:
I never use runserver.BAT to run my server (i ALWAYS used compile.BAT - and it WORKED for the past 2 wks… like it says in the title…)

Well, after that error, i tried using runserver.BAT to well… run my server… and guess what happened?!?
Runserver.BAT closes EXTREMELY quickly without saying anything - WEIRD…

Details About My Server: It’s a HAMACHI server… i have hamachi logged in whenever possible, in this case RiGhT now (in the date of this thread).

SO! Ppl, if u care to help, PLEASE do. I really want my server up and running again… This is the most strangest error i have ever encountered…
